cards.title: Design
cards.desc: 100% custom, no templates. Every website is designed for your brand, and to look great on mobile and desktop.

cards.title: Performance
cards.desc: Fast and optimized websites you fully own. Choose Webflow or custom code, according to your needs.

cards.title: SEO
cards.desc: Websites optimized for SEO and accessibility. Easy to navigate, search-friendly, and built to rank on Google.

section.title: I build to last.
section.text: A good website should serve you for years. I follow your vision, keep the code clean, and avoid shortcuts so you can own it, update it, and grow with it.

cards.title: Built to Last
cards.desc: Websites made with clean code, strong performance, and scalability in mind. They serve your business for years, not months.

cards.title: Craft Over Shortcuts
cards.desc: No templates, no quick fixes. Every project is designed and developed properly, with care and attention to detail.

cards.title: Transparent Process
cards.desc: Everything is clear from day one: contract, scope, and fees. You always know where we stand.

cards.title: Full Visibility
cards.desc: You can follow the entire process in real time in a Notion document. Tasks, timelines, and progress all in one place.

cards.title: 100% Yours
cards.desc: When we launch, you own everything: the code, the content, and the hosting. No lock-ins.

cards.title: Partnership
cards.desc: I value lasting relationships. You get support and guidance beyond launch, not just a quick hand-off.

dynamic.title: Dynamic Marketing Site

custom.title: Custom Web App
custom.subtitle: For development of complex web applications or big ecommerce sites.

Custom workflows and dashboards for your team.
